mapper.insert: insert into item(name, itemName, address, phone, email, createtime) values (#{name}, #{itemName}, #{ address}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{createtime})
mapper.update: update item set name = #{name}, address = #{address}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email},updatetime = #{updatetime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select * from item
name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and address like concat('%', #{address}, '%')
